name: Sahara Driving Car
description:
Sahara Driving Car is a lot of fun out there in the desert, lots of jeeps and the whole desert to drive for. Experience the thrilling crazy drive in the desert of SAHARA the world’s most beautiful desert.
Features:
• Nice smooth control
• Awesome Desert environment
• Multiple monster jeeps
• Rally in the desert
• Beat the time
• Reach the checkpoints
• Follow the circles
